alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 10 at 2:11PM EST until November 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Little Manatee River At Wimauma at US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. .Heavy rainfall from Tropical Storm Nicole has caused river levels to rise along the Little Manatee River. For the Little Manatee...including Wimauma at US 301...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Manatee River At Wimauma at US 301. * WHEN...From Friday evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The river overflows its banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 6.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 11.1 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.1 feet on 07/06/1939. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Little Manatee River Wimauma at US 301 11.0 6.7 Thu 1 pm 10.5 10.7 8.8 7.0 6.0 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 515 AM EST.
